divs: Sighting DetailsWhat we observed the three of us was three bright red lights appearing one at a time switching back and forth indirection for about set 7 to 9 minutes. At one point in the south sky the furthest one to the left turn very bright white. There were also aircraft within the area and you can tell the difference. I've never seen anything in my life like this and to be honest I almost wish I didn't see it. They look to be maybe 500 feet off the ground but it also was more than a mile away that the event look to be taking place was definitely still over Michigan but way south of my location.
